== Blood smear ==
=> Activated mononuclear cells, characterised by a ''large size and hyperbasophilic cytoplasm = polymorphic cells, sometimes'' described as ''atypical'' = activated T lymphocytes.

=> Absence of blast cells

=> Other haematopoietic lineages are normal.

question.title: What is a characteristic of the blood smear of a patient with mononucleosis syndrome?
question.description: The blood smear shows activated mononuclear cells

option_a.title: A large size and hyperbasophilic cytoplasm
option_a.description: A characteristic of activated mononuclear cells

option_b.title: The presence of blast cells
option_b.description: A common feature of many blood disorders

option_c.title: Normal-sized and hypoplastic cytoplasm
option_c.description: A characteristic of normal mononuclear cells

option_d.title: A mixture of different blood cell types
option_d.description: A feature of some blood disorders
